page.title: 08The Recreation Field.
page.content: The recreation field just North of the river is 7.6 acres and is maintained by Felton Parish Council who bought the land from the local squire who lived in Felton Park. Money was raised locally 6 years ago to provide 2 sets of swings,a climbing frame,a see-saw and some goal posts.The"Felton Frolic" was held in 1981 to raise money for goal posts. There were all kinds of stalls,pony rides,a fancy dress foot- ball match and sports. The money is still in the bank but everyone had a very good day. People who used the rec. 1 weekend in June 1985.-- Friday 6.30-7.00pm 9 Sat. 11.00-11.30am 28 1.00-1.30pm 8 Sun. 10.30-11.00am 30 1.30-2.00pm 7
